sentences.en: A hard copy of the screen display can also be obtained from a printer.
sentences.cn: 屏幕上显示的内容也可以通过打印机打印一份。

sentences.en: A printer which does form - feed function automatically.
sentences.cn: 一种具有自动 换页 功能的打印机.

sentences.en: Click on the printer icon with the mouse.
sentences.cn: 用鼠标点击打印机图标。

sentences.en: computer consumables such as disks and printer cartridges
sentences.cn: 如磁盘、打印机墨盒之类的电脑耗材

sentences.en: He moved to Leeds and set up as a printer.
sentences.cn: 他搬到利兹干起了印刷业.

sentences.en: He was a printer by trade and naturalist by avocation.
sentences.cn: 他从事印刷业，同时是个博物学爱好者。

sentences.en: I hint that the faint saint painted the printer with a pint of paint.
sentences.cn: 我暗示说虚弱的圣徒用了一品脱油漆涂印刷机。

sentences.en: If Mr. Jones can't find a job as a teacher, he can fall back on his skill as a printer.
sentences.cn: 如果琼斯先生找不到当老师的工作, 他可以凭他的技术搞印刷.

sentences.en: the interface between computer and printer
sentences.cn: 计算机和打印机之间的接口

sentences.en: The printer can set this additional page in here.
sentences.cn: 这位印刷工把这额外的一页加在这里.

sentences.en: The printer has left out two lines from this paragraph.
sentences.cn: 印刷工人把这一段漏了两行.

sentences.en: They are articled to a printer.
This automatic printer can print 120 pages a minute.
sentences.cn: 这台自动印刷机每分钟能印一百二十页.

trans.tran_cn: 打印机，印刷机，印刷商，印刷厂，印刷业从业人员，印花工
trans.tran_en: a machine which is connected to a computer and can make a printed record of computer information
